name: UNION BANCAIRE PRIVEE
memberOrga: UBP is member of different trade associations and organisations related to the financial services sector in Switzerland and EU, such as the SFAMA, ASB,ALFI, and others (non-exhaustive list).
goal: Union Bancaire Priv√©e (UBP) is a long-standing Swiss private bank, with a Tier 1 ratio of 27.4% as at 31 December 2017. The Bank is specialised in Asset management for both private and institutional clients. It is based in Geneva and employs 1700 people in over twenty locations worldwide; it held some CHF 125.3 billion in assets under management as at 31 December 2017.
interests: Climate Action, Development, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Taxation
euInitiatives: Principally EU action plan on sustainable Finance. Also other broader initiatives relevant to the financial services industry.
